message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a good price for the product. How about we meet in the middle at $82.50?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $78?
I understand you're still looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. How about we meet in the middle at $79.50?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $77?
